thread.title: IAG's acquisition of Aer Lingus moves a step closer
thread.title_full: IAG's acquisition of Aer Lingus moves a step closer

title: IAG's acquisition of Aer Lingus moves a step closer
text:
International Airlines Group has been given the green light for its takeover of Aer Lingus after more than 50% of shareholders backed the proposal. 
The acceptance brings the sale of the Irish carrier a step closer. 
Earlier this week the European Commission cleared the deal. In order to get regulatory approval IAG offered up slots at Gatwick airport for flights to Dublin and Belfast. 
Last week, Ryanair agreed to sell its 29.8% stake in Aer Lingus. Have your say
